title: Ian Blackford – 2021 Comments about Allegra Stratton Laughing About Christmas Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Blackford, the SNP Leader at Westminster, on 7 December 2021.
content: Here we have Number 10, a government in London, breaking its own Covid rules and then joking about it on a video. It really isn’t acceptable and I have to say, unfortunately, that on the basis of this behaviour, because it’s not just about this, it fits a pattern of a Prime Minister that repeatedly lies, a Prime Minister that can’t be trusted. He should go and he should go now.
